text:
@senrobportman @realDonaldTrump #coronavirus.
"This is no time for partisan politics. We need to come together and stay vigilant to prepare and protect the American people."  I agree! So in that spirit, I ask, what actual aggressive and proactive action is the administration taking, specifically?

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
